nars.storage

Class Distributor

  • java.lang.Object
    • nars.storage.Distributor

  • public final class Distributor
extends java.lang.Object
    A pseudo-random number generator, used in Bag.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int capacity
      Capacity of the array
      short[] order
      Shuffled sequence of index numbers

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Distributor(int range)
      For any number N < range, there is N+1 copies of it in the array, distributed as evenly as possible

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Distributor get(int range) 
      int next(int index)
      Advance the index
      short pick(int index)
      Get the next number according to the given index
